name: yaml-path-extractor
description: Extracts the path to a YAML key

yamlPathExtractor.pathSeparator.markdownDescription: String used to separate the path parts. For example, 'path **.** to **.** your **.** key'

yamlPathExtractor.ignoreFilenameRoot.markdownDescription: Ignore the root key if it matches the file name. This is usefull for I18n on Ruby on Rails.
enumDescriptions: Ignore the root key if it matches the file name. Example: /en.yml -> en: key: value -> key.value
Don't ignore the root key if it matches the file name. Example: /en.yml -> en: key: value -> en.key.value

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
